notesStmt.note: Stained and slightly damaged by damp. Lacuna after folio 82.
Folio 1 and 94 are paper, and do not form part of the original manuscript.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Ḥiburim ḳetsarim be-῾inyane masorah ṿe-diḳduḳ חבורים קצרים בעייני מסורה ודקדוק

collation.p: 12 quires of mostly 8 leaves each, marked with catchwords at the end, and with pen-and ink designs at the beginning and at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script of the 14th century.
